DOC.brief_summary: The hypothesis study administration antenatal steroid woman high risk preterm birth 34 week gestation would reduce risk respiratory complication , specifically Respiratory Distress Syndrome ( RDS ) Transient Tachypnea Newborn ( TTN ) late preterm baby .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Antenatal Steroids Reducing Respiratory Morbidities Late Preterm Infants
DOC.criteria: Women 34 0/7 36 6/7 week gestation High risk preterm birth Multiple birth Fetal congenital malformation A course steroid within 2 week randomization Multiple course steroid Chorioamnionitis Non reassure fetal heart rate Obstetrical indication delivery Active bleeding Pregnancy relate hypertensive disorder Uncontrolled diabetes
